summary: A severe decrease in funding forces a mental hospital to release mass-murderer Ethel Janowski into a halfway house. Ethel is psychotic and delusional and has a hefty appetite. In fact, her ... See full summary Â»
cast: Priscilla Alden|Robert Copple|Charles Egan|Lisa Farros|Michael Flood|George 'Buck' Flower|Sonny La Rocca|Jane Lambert|Ginna Martine|Cliff McDonald|Sandra Shotwell|Joe Elliot|Albert Eskinazi|Royal Farros|Frances Millard|Nick Millard|Fred Sarra
title: Criminally Insane 2
